name: infisical
description: Infisical is an open source secret management platform for developers. It centralizes environment variables and secrets, provides access controls, audits and integrations with CI, and is available as both a cloud and self hosted solution.

features.title: REST API
features.description: Store API keys, passwords, and environment variables in one secure location

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Organize secrets by environment (dev, staging, production)

features.title: Access Control
features.description: Define granular permissions for who can read or modify secrets

features.title: Audit Logging
features.description: Track all secret access and modifications for compliance

features.title: Version History
features.description: View and rollback to previous versions of secrets

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Choose between self-hosting or managed cloud deployment
